title: Drawing, Design for a Six-Legged Adjustable Rectangular Dining Table, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Six-Legged Adjustable Rectangular Dining Table
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4'x5'; at lower right corner: DINING TABLE / VX-OX; in pen and red ink, lower right corner: V [inverted "U"]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular molded top with rounded corners and dividing stretcher running across center, raised on 6 [5 shown] carved, turned and fluted tapering legs on casters.  Floral decorations at table top corners.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Six-Legged Adjustable Rectangular Dining Table, 1900–05. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-140
